column2: we employ more than 60 people. And in this day and age
column3: our online reputation is vital to the success of our business. We review and respond to nearly every review that gets shot across our bow -- good or bad -- and the reason we do this is because our employees' livelihoods depend on it. They are working here because they have bills to pay
column4: children to feed and looming school debt to pay off.
